description: Emitted when an action completes successfully so downstream systems can react to the outcome.

eventName.description: Optional explicit event name included for legacy compatibility.

actionId.description: The fully-qualified identifier of the action that succeeded.

actorId.description: The entity identifier for the actor who performed the action.

targetId.description: Identifier for the primary target of the action when one exists.

success.description: Indicates the action completed successfully. Always true for this event.
